Description: Rectangular sandstone relief of Amenemhat: worshipping figures and hieroglyphic text; some painted detail.
Curator's comments: For the harpists song see J. Assmann et al. Altaegyptische Totenliturgien II Totenliturgien und Totensprueche in Grabinschriften des Neuen Reiches (Heidelberg 2005), 583-5.
